name: First Hotel Breiseth

reviews.title: Definitely not a hotel.. but nice enough to be an Inn
reviews.text: Stayed here for one night as part of a larger tour group. This is definitely not a "hotel" by international standard, but since it is located in a small rural area, I will rate it based on a "inn". If you want hotel standards, the Radisson SAS nearby maybe the better option.

reviews.title: Worst hotel in this area so far
Nice rates combined with ski passes

likes.liked: — The rate including a ski pass

description: First Hotel Breiseth, established in 1898, is one of the oldest hotels in Lillehammer. At the time of its opening, it was considered the most fashionable hotel in town. During its first 40 years of operation the hotel was very popular among a group of artist. Cash was not always forthcoming, and as a result the hotel received a number of paintings still decorating its walls. As a guest at our hotel you will be within walking distance of attractions like Maihaugen, Lillehammer art museum, the pedestrian precinct Gagata, several restaurants and a range of activities. Ski bus to Hafjell departs close to the hotel.
